Future home of BeagleBoard.org

The Beagle Board is a low-cost, fan-less single-board computer based on Texas Instruments' OMAP35x device family, with all of the expandability of today's desktop machines, but without the bulk, expense, or noise.

We are in the phase of hand-selecting early adopters to receive the limited number of boards we have. Please subscribe to the mailing list to get notification of when we will begin to take orders. There is also an early-adopter request e-mail address that you can find by looking at the mailing list archives (revb-request).

When boards go on sale, they will be available for $149 (plus shipping) via a link from this page. We will be utilizing a world-wide distributor with reach for most countries. Initial availability will be for Rev. B boards, with support for a single USB port (OTG). Rev. C boards will add support for an additional USB port (EHCI), enabling the use of one USB port for power and another port to act as a USB host. The Rev. B boards may use the USB port to provide power to the board or to act as a USB host, but not both at the same time. There is a 5V power connector on the board for when you want to use the USB port in host mode.
